page.title: 06A GLOSSOPDALE SCHOOLGIRL (2)
page.content: At{break}crisps are sold and there are stalls and games in aid of{C.A.F.O.D. or we go out and play games like{Rush. At{10.45am.}we start work again until { 12.15pm.}- lunchtime. After dinner we have a long play out. At{ 1.20pm.}we go back to work until {3.20pm.}when we pack up, and if there is any time we listen to a story (At the moment we are reading{....'The {Year of the Worm'}by Ann Pilling) At {3.30pm.}we put our chairs on our tables and it is time to go home. I walk home with three or four friends, and when I get there{I feed {the cats,}get a cereal, watch Tv and read a little. Often my friend Rachael rings up and asks me to come out. We go to the{local park}and play on the { {swings etc.}I go home to watch a little Tv or read till my parents kiss me goodnight. <cont.from p5.)
